body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Water-Resistant Hooded Puffer Coat (Available in Plus Size)
features: Fabric type Shell: 100% Nylon; Lining: 100% Polyester; Fill: 100% Polyester
REGULAR FIT: Close but comfortable fit through chest, waist, and hips.

WATER-RESISTANT TAFFETA: Plain weave shell fabric in 100% Nylon for solid colors and 100% Polyester for prints and neon colors. Fully lined, quilted and insulated. Designed to keep you extra protected for the coldest winter days

HOODED PUFFER: This ultralight puffer is the perfect essential for bringing comfort and warmth to your everyday. Wear it with a t-shirt for brisk fall days or layer with a sweater for the colder winter months. Accessorize your look with Amazon Essential's Scarves and Beanies.
DETAILS: Features a classic quilted pattern, flattering seam details for a more shaped tailored fit, front 2-way zipper closure, zip pockets, hood, and elasticized cuffs.

Features a 2-Way Zipper: To close, pull down the upper slider until it touches the bottom slider. Insert the separable pin to the very bottom of the bottom slider (incomplete insertion may cause issues). Pull up the upper slider with the left hand. To open, pull down the top slider until it touches the bottom slider. Pull out the separable pin with the right hand.
body.description: We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family. Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Water-Resistant Hooded Puffer Coat is an absolute gem in my winter wardrobe! This packable and travel-friendly jacket has proven to be a versatile and reliable companion in various weather conditions.The water-resistant feature adds a practical touch, keeping me dry and comfortable during unexpected rain or snow. The lightweight design is perfect for layering, providing warmth without the bulk, and the inclusion of a hood adds an extra layer of protection against the elements.One of the standout features is its packability. This coat effortlessly folds into a compact size, making it incredibly convenient for travel. Whether I'm headed for a weekend getaway or packing for a longer trip, this puffer coat is a space-saving essential that doesn't compromise on functionality.The fit is flattering, and the overall quality of the jacket is impressive, especially considering its affordable price point. The variety of available colors is a nice touch, allowing for personal style preferences.In summary, the Amazon Essentials Lightweight Water-Resistant Hooded Puffer Coat is a winner in terms of style, functionality, and portability. It's a must-have for anyone seeking a reliable and travel-friendly winter coat. Five stars without a doubt! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewerName: Very easily used and WORKES. Very satisfied
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Light, but warm. Love the length of the jacket. Color is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars found a bag this can stuff into...
reviews.reviewText: downgrading below review to 4 stars. why?:1. i have worn one coat only a few times, and the zipper is totally messed up. i actually noticed this soon after purchasing but was like 'i'll deal with it, after a few tries i can get it to work.' but .... now it's not working at all. i dont think the other two colors i bought have this problem but i haven't worn them much yet. i suppose they had to put in a lightweight zipper but i wish it worked bc now i have to throw away a pretty new coat.2. this coat i'm wearing, the green one, has already ripped. the fabric is thin. perhaps this comes with the territory of being ultralight? but my other ultralight jackets by 32 degrees i wear all the time have not ripped.3. i wrote below how you need to buy a separate bag to pack this in, and i did buy it. unfortunalty i forget to bring it, though i will try attaching it to my other amazon coat (I have this coat in 3 colors). but upon thinking about it, it is really annoying that they just didn't design the coat's bag correctly in the first place, making it much bigger. no one should have to buy a separate bag. i was at the museum of natural history the other day and was so annoyed i could NOT pack the coat into amazon's attached bag (i forgot to bring the separate bag i bought, and yes i should have replaced amazon's bag with mine. but the fact that i am tasked with having to buy a separate bag and replacing amazon's bag with my new one is annoying. i do not have this problem with other brands. i wouldn't buy this again unless they fix the other issues.coat is great, wish it came in prettier colors. i wear a L in sweatpants, dresses, and usually in coats in general i size up to an XL. first i got this in a L and thought it was a bit snug...i looked a bit like a stuffed sausage. then i got it in an XL and it really made me look bigger/bulkier. went back to a L and am satisfied. yes i look a bit like a stuffed sausage but id prefer that than to looking larger. even with the L, i can wear a fleece underneath and still zip it up.cons--i am almost 5'8. i wish this were about 2-3" longer - it doesnt cover the part of my thighs that i'm not happy with, i have to wear a long t shirt.-the sack it comes with - this coat does not stuff into it. i just got a 32 degree brand jacket and that easily stuffs into the bag it comes with, in several seconds flat. this? no way. fo this coat, i had to buy "Granite Gear AirBags Stuff Sack Set - 2 7L" - i just guessed on the 7 liter size and wham, was lucky, this coat stuffed right into that. wish this came with a bigger stuff sack so i didn't have to buy expensive stuff sacks on my own.-i'm not a fan of the colors. i wish it came in tan, a pink, and a prettier shade of blue. i was kind of shocked they don't have a basic tan color. i can see how people get addicted to these - i am keeping the black, the green, and the red, but i'm not in love with the red, i wish it were more of a cherry red.-i wish this were just a tad more shapely, with a more defined waist and a bit of a flair, but that's just me, i'm super feminine. this isn't bad, it's certainly better than how uniqlo looked on me. i have curves.pros-really is lightweight, and in mid 30 degree weather in NYC, i wore a fleece under this, and was warm enough!this has got me obsessed with the idea of travling light. also when you wear it you can feel the lightweightness of it it's like a freeing feeling. i have a bigger, much heavier down coat and this isn't QUITE as warm as that, so i will save that one, but this definitely makes me feel light and free while still keeping me warm.-pockets are nice, i put my hands in them and they stay warm-portability. again, i was annoyed i had to buy a separate stuff sack for this, but i can see how, when i travel from nyc to florida, it will be really, really nice to be able to stuff this in a little bag rather than schlep it around.so i am keeping these, but i also am going to try the 32 degree brand bc they have longer coats, and one in tan. i'll probably end up keeping ALL of them. just in love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this coat!
reviews.reviewText: I love the length of this coat, my husband does not, as it covers my booty completely, and he doesn’t get to ogle or grab it…I’m 5’6” and it comes to about mid-thigh when standing.The length was great for sledding with my boys this winter, no snow came up the back!Bonus: my 10 year old told me I look skinny in this coat!I love that there are two zippers on the front, so it doesn’t have to be zipped all the way from the bottom, this is especially handy while driving!Pockets zip shut!It’s both lightweight and warm at the same time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lame Pockets and zipper issues
reviews.reviewText: Coat is alright. Decent length but more snug of a fit than I prefer and I purchased it in the same size that I always do in Amazon Essentials. My big problem is the pockets. The outside pockets are okay. They could be a bit larger and lined for warmth. The bigger problem is that there is a panel on both sides of the front interior and I assumed they were long pockets. So stoked! I threw my phone in and it slid right out the bottom. I couldn’t believe it. The two panels are sewn in place on the sides but not at the bottom. I considered just getting the bottom sewn but then I realized after seeing it once that the zippers are cheap and thin. A coat needs a nice zipper. The zipper on this coat is thin with tiny teeth and it gets caught on the fabric repeatedly. Too bad!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight option
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an affordable light coat/ jacket for fall and mild winter days.I saw the price and style and knew I had to give this one a tryIt fits well and provides enough warmth against a little chill.5ft 3, 165lbs. Purchased a large looking for something that wouldn’t be too oversized but would allow me to wear a sweater underneath. This works perfectly!Roomy pockets, which is always important.Love that this can be folded up and placed in its bag to save space. Im able to easily put this in my work bag to stay prepared since it folds up easily and comes with its own storage bag. I also take this with me on hikes since temperatures drop as elevation increases. Easy to throw in a backpack and pull out when needed.If you’re on the fence, give this a shot. I think you’ll be presently surprised!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute pink puffer jacket!
reviews.reviewText: I love this jacket! I feel I travel back to my childhood style while wearing it! It is a little thinner in material, but it does keep you warm! Plus, it comes with a mini bag inside the jacket that you are able to fold it in to consolidate in your purse or storage!
La mejor. Calidad y funcionalidad. Me encanta!
Es una chamarra larga, delgada y muy compacta.¡La relación precio calidad fue muy buena dado que 3staba en oferta a 659 pesos.
Amazing coat! Very nice, light(pocketable) and warm. Exact size. Good price. I really recommended it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mala calidad. No me gustó nada.
reviews.reviewText: Mala calidad de chamarra.El relleno no está distribuido uniformemente en la chamarra, está hecho bolas en unos lados y en otros solamente se siente la tela.La tela es muy delgada, como si fuera tela de un paraguas.En cuanto al ajuste, es una chamarra sin forma, un cuadrado nada más. Está muy fea la verdad.
Bel capo, pratico, facile e col cappuccio, molto comodo e portabile fino a 10 gradi di temperatura. Ne ho comprati 2
